content: What science fiction television show follows the adventures of Captain Jean-Luc Picard and his crew aboard the starship USS Enterprise (NCC-1701-D)?

I believe the television show you're referring to is "Star Trek: The Next Generation." It aired from 1987 to 1994 and was created by Gene Roddenberry, the creator of the original "Star Trek" series. In this show, Captain Jean-Luc Picard leads the crew of the USS Enterprise (NCC-1701-D) on various missions exploring the galaxy, encountering different alien species, and facing moral and ethical dilemmas. The series is known for its strong character development, thought-provoking storylines, and attention to detail in its portrayal of a futuristic society.
